content: this is a basic hat pattern with a chevron design knitted using slip stitches size can be increased or decreased by adding or deleting stitches in multiples of 4 casting on 84 stitches with worsted weight yarn and a #8 needle will result in an adult size hat this pattern was designed by my mother betty kiesewetter for the greater st louis knitters guild members can access this and other hat patterns in the members area section of the guild website 1 under patterns anyone is welcome to join the guild for access to patterns written by several guild members see about the guild page for membership information 1 http //www gslkg com/
